data.meta_description: Support GISSV - German International School of Silicon Valley
data.text:
At GISSV, our utmost commitment is to empower our students with top-notch dual-language education, paving the way for their academic and personal triumphs. As an independent, non-profit institution, we wholeheartedly rely on the support of our remarkable community to elevate the educational journey of our students. We enthusiastically invite you to engage and provide financial support beyond tuition fees. Discover the myriad ways to contribute to our thriving community within this website section.

Consider the enduring impact you can create by including GISSV in your estate plan; it opens remarkable opportunities for the students of tomorrow. We deeply value all forms of support, whether it's a generous donation in cash or stocks, a heartfelt tribute to a beloved teacher, your invaluable volunteerism, or hosting events that unite us.

Got questions or eager to learn more? Reach out to us at giving@gissv.org, and we'll be delighted to assist you.

GISSV holds 501(c)(3) non-profit status, making most gifts tax-deductible (tax number 77-0530703).

We extend our heartfelt gratitude for your unwavering support in nurturing our school community.

Together, we fuel success and dreams for every student at GISSV.

At GISSV, everyone can contribute to our success, from parents, teachers, and staff to alumni, their families, and friends. Here are some of the fundraising initiatives that support our school financially while building a strong community:

Annual Campaign-SteppingStones

The Annual Campaign now known as SteppingStones, is the heart and soul of GISSV’s fundraising endeavors, it’s more than just a campaign. Imagine a world where GISSV’s high academic standards shine even brighter every year. That’s exactly what the Annual Campaign makes possible.

Every gift matters, no matter its size! Each contribution helps us fulfill our mission of providing an outstanding GISSV experience for every student. Your participation is like the special ingredient that adds flavor to our SteppingStones campaign. It’s a way to demonstrate your dedication to GISSV’s mission and values, and it serves as a guiding light, drawing the attention of potential donors, foundations, and corporations. Together, as a strong supportive community, we can ensure GISSV’s continued success!

Inspire others to join our cause and support top-quality education for ALL students. Let’s create a brighter future TOGETHER.

Join us today and be part of the magic that makes GISSV shine.

Help us Educate & Elevate! (Learn more)
